entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
